column4: Hi! I install ubuntu 11.10 on VMware, i update it, but it can't find my graphical drivers! how can i install this additional driver in my ubuntu????
vmware emulates specific hardware, so im not sure what 'drivers' you would be needing
normally theres some sort of 'guest' addations for vmware, or vbox. that  provide drivers for the os to work better with the  VM.
